articles.title: Sir Ian McKellen won't return for Player Kings tour after injury - BBC.com
articles.description: The actor fell off stage last month during a performance of Player Kings at the Noël Coward theatre.
articles.content:
By Steven McIntosh, Entertainment reporter
Sir Ian McKellen will not appear on the UK tour of his latest theatre production, after he was injured while performing in London. 
The veteran actor fell… [+1650 chars]
